item.title: #TIL : Compressing and Extracting files with rar in Linux
item.description: Compressing and Extracting files with rar in Linux zip and tar disadvantages All unicode filename will be transform to weird character, so it makes broken paths and broken links

item.title: #TIL : Bash shell shortcuts
item.description: Bash shell shortcuts Ctrl + e : jump cursor to EOL Ctrl + a : jump cursor to BOL (beginning of line) Ctrl + u : delete all from cursor to BOL Ctrl + k : delete all from cursor to EOL Ctrl + r : search history, press again for next search Ctrl + l : clear shell screen Ctrl + c : terminate the command (sometimes have to press twice) Ctrl + z : suspend the command, back to shell.

item.title: #TIL : Stats your top-10 frequently commands
item.description: Stats your top-10 frequently commands Run this command, it will show top-10 frequently commands, explain shell

item.title: #TIL : Commands
item.description: Commands Command lsof List all opened files, sockets, pipes Eg: List processes are using port 80 (need root if port between 1-1023) # sudo lsof -i:80 List processes are using /bin/bash # lsof /bin/bash
